Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Stacy Fournet
Reviews.Content: I LOVE THIS CAMERA.  !!! One of the best entry level cameras on the market.  I'm still trying to figure out all it can do.  It does a bunch

Reviews.Title: The camera is awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Lache
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this product to the more intermediated picture inthusiast. Easy to use and has nice features from land scapes to portraits.
